content: But even though we're not -- we're filing for permits this year, we've been doing work on gathering data for that process for almost two years, I think, I'm not exactly sure how long, but for quite some time, the data that's necessary for those permits, the history around everything that you have to report on to get the permits. So that's â we want to get up the speed and operating, but it's operating today, and we'll probably â it will ramp up over the next year, I think, to kind of the full capacity, acquisition capacity, which is around â we target at 25,000 tons.
